question: Some people think that cars are the best way to travel in the city, while others think that bicycle isbetter. Discuss both views and give your own opinion
text: Travelling by cars has become increasingly popular these days. While many people use cars for commuting, a lot of people prefer to ride bicycles. This essay will discuss why bicycling has its own benefits, but why using cars is much better in many ways.

Nowadays, bicycling is one of the easiest ways to commute in the city. People can just grab their bicycles and ride from place to place. Not only is it a convenient vehicle, but it is also exercising riders while travelling. Currently, many countries build and provide extra lanes for bicycles to prevent traffic jam problems. It also decreases the amount of Carbon-dioxide emissions to the air. Therefore, bicycling in the town is the best choice for people who want to exercise while travelling as well as slow the global warming process in the future.
